description: Try our easy to follow Maple-Glazed Carrots & Sprouts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Brussels sprout,Roast,Seafood free,Egg free,Dec 2019,Discovery Garden,Christmas,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan
name: Maple-Glazed Carrots & Sprouts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the maple glaze, whisk all the ingredients together in a small jug. Set aside.
In a large roasting pan, combine sprouts and carrot. Drizzle over half the glaze and toss to coat well. Season. Bake for 15 minutes.
Drizzle vegetables with remaining glaze and scatter over rosemary. Stir with a large slotted spoon. Bake for a further 12 minutes or until just tender and starting to caramelise.
Stir through cranberries and pine nuts. Serve drizzled with pan juices.
